Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, excavate. [i](Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a land card, put a colorless artifact token named Loot onto the battlefield. It has ‘Sacrifice this artifact: Add {1} to your mana pool.')[/i]
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from your library, untap target artifact you control.
